name: Adventure Quiz: Capcom World
overview: Adventure Quiz: Capcom World is a quiz game released in Japanese arcades in 1989. It was later ported to the PC Engine CD alongside Adventure Quiz 2: Hatena? no Daibouken. The princess of the Capcom Kingdom was kidnapped, and the hero must pass by six worlds to save her. In the end of each world he faces a Capcom character.
